txt.en: The missive can be found near Ohtar in Díngarth.\n\nYou should collect the missive.

'Your timing is impeccable, for this missive contains information concerning the plans of our gathered foes, especially those in encampments nearby. These details should enable us to launch assaults upon them before they do the same to us!\n\n'You have my thanks for the timely delivery.'

'Thinking about those steaks quite drove another important matter from my mind! What would Isildur say? He would not be happy about it, I will tell you that much!\n\n'Scouts have learned something of great importance for the men at Adambel, and the details of it are contained in this missive. See that it is delivered to Eärtur in Adambel, as quickly as you can! I am counting on you!'
Bring the missive to Eärtur in Adambel
This missive of tactical importance should be delivered to Adambel at once!
Ohtar, Esquire of Isildur, wishes to deliver a missive of tactical importance to Eärtur in Adambel.
Eärtur can be found at Adambel.\n\nYou should bring the missive to Eärtur.
